name: AmiSnakes
description:
This is a beta version of snake-game for an Amiga.

 - Single player or Two players mode (split screen)

 - 6 different worlds

 - adventure story mode

Controls:

Select:           ENTER

1st player : cursor keys

2nd player : WASD keys

Exit :                 ESC key

Pause:              P

What is missing yet:

 - game oves screen

 - end game screen

 - rewriting map screen in adventure mode

 - there will be better graphics in the future
